name: CONFINIUM
description:
CONFINIUM (SpinOFF)

CONFINIUM is a fanmade prequel to OFF in two acts. 

You start playing as an aviator elsen from one of the new zones who is simply called ‘Pilot’, and as you explore the zones you gradually uncover the story revolving around the King, Hugo, the Guardians and the world itself.

Disclaimer:

This is a tribute game based on a french indie RPG "OFF" created by Mortis Ghost. The creator of CONFINIUM owns no rights to the original material on which this game is based on. This game is free and does not generate any revenue.
